articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: A wake-up call for anti-China forces in India, the EU: Global Times - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (Global Times/ANN): A prominent member of the European Parliament, Mick Wallace, recently called on the EU to stop using "shared values" as a cover to engage India and use the country as a geopolitical tool to contain China's development, which is "ex…
